execution_plan.description: Retrieve all EU customers' ids and email addresses (exclude null emails). These are the candidate EU accounts to check for migration.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS eu_customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;

execution_plan.description: Find US customers whose email matches any email from the EU customers found in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS us_customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE email IN ($step1.email);
